stepTitle: Use this sample data to construct a 90% confidence interval for the mean age of CEO’s for these top small firms. Use the Student's t-distribution. (48, 59, 59, 74, 60, 63, 43, 67, 55, 57, 67, 58, 51, 63, 60, 57, 61, 55, 61, 53, 57, 47, 62, 55, 56, 50, 46, 55, 49, 49)
stepBody: Use the Student's t-distribution. Round answers to three decimal place. Wrap answer with parenthesis, separete by a comma, no spacing.
